author: travelandtourworld.com
title: SailRail: Thinking of travelling over to the Rugby World Cup?Travelandtourworld.com
text:
SailRail: Thinking of travelling over to the Rugby World Cup? Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
Time is ticking, with just over a fortnight to go until the start of the 2015 Rugby World Cup starts, it’s the perfect time to book your SailRail tickets and avail of our fantastic rail and sail services.
The World Cup will see 20 teams representing both the Northern and Southern hemispheres as they all battle it out to be crowned World Champions.
This is your last chance to see one of the most iconic players to ever wear the green jersey, as Captain Paul O’Connell gets ready to hang up his boots on a remarkable career.
Prices include Ferry crossing and UK rail journey and prices are also available for travel from any Iarnród Éireann station.
Fares Dublin to London €47 each way Dublin to Cardiff €44 each way Dublin to Birmingham €42 each way Dublin to Manchester €41 each way
Source:- SailRail
